item.title: Shadowrun
item.description: Shadowrun (the game) can be read as wish for vengeance against colonizers. There are means to manipulate the world that do not have their origins in European thought (i.e. science, technology) and can deliver mega-violence. Some kind of response to Toledo steel, the machine gun and the atom bomb; it invariably involves spirits (e.g. the great ghost dance) or some other form of magic. Nature literally fights back and indigenous tribes now have means to down helicopters.

item.title: ChatGPT, D&D and Greek/Roman deities
item.description:
So I’ve asked ChatGPT to write comment on the stats and alignment of each Greek/Roman deities, results below. Not bad, though I would have done it very differently.

  1. Zeus/Jupiter (King of the Gods):

    • Primary Stat: Charisma (CHA)
    • Secondary Stat: Strength (STR)
    • Alignment: Lawful Good
    • Justification: Zeus is often portrayed as a just ruler, upholding laws and order on Mount Olympus. While he is not without flaws, his role as the king of the gods aligns with a lawful approach to governance.
